description: Extracted and integrated over 800 data objects from Salesforce and SIS into Snowflake using Airbyte and Python, building and maintaining a historical data warehouse that improved data accessibility and reliability for university stakeholders.
Designed and implemented comprehensive admissions data models that enabled the Admissions team to perform detailed tally and journey-based applicant analyses, increasing reporting accuracy by 30%.
Automated weekly data refresh workflows using DBT, optimizing upstream and downstream processes to ensure timely and consistent data updates with zero downtime.
Developed Slowly Changing Dimension (SCD) Type 2 models to accurately track and maintain multiple versions of student applica- tions, enhancing longitudinal data analysis capabilities.
Created dynamic Power BI dashboards that identified application trends and highlighted top-performing and underperforming programs, supporting data-driven decision-making and resource allocation.

Engineered an Al-driven customer sentiment analysis solution using a Random Forest model on Redshift data, prioritizing customer queries and reducing response delays by 43%, cutting turnaround time from 3.5 to 2 days.
Integrated Generative AI and vector-store technology into customer chat systems, automating query summarization and reducing coordinator response delays by 35%.
Developed and deployed a fully automated MLOps pipeline with Airflow, enabling continuous training and deployment of the model, resulting in a 0.2% weekly improvement in prediction accuracy.
Conducted rigorous A/B testing to validate solution effectiveness, driving measurable improvements in customer service efficiency and satisfaction.
Enhanced performance across 20+ complex banking databases by implementing advanced SQL indexing and stored procedures, accelerating query speeds by 50% and improving data quality for analytics teams.
Redesigned AWS Glue ETL pipelines with Python-based parallel processing, reducing execution time by 40% and achieving significant infrastructure cost savings.

Conducted exploratory data analysis on credit datasets using PySpark, uncovering patterns that improved customer credit profile forecasting accuracy and reduced financial risk exposure by approximately 20%.
Collaborated with Agile teams to refine DevOps and CI/CD workflows, ensuring reliable and timely delivery of BNPL data models, improving deployment efficiency by 25%.

projects: AlssueFlow | GitHub Issue Management using NLP and Vector SearchSep 2023 - Dec 2023 • Engineered a real-time issue management system leveraging the GitHub API to extract issue data, storing structured metadata in Snowflake for efficient retrieval and analytics • Implemented NLP-driven embedding generation using a pre-trained BERT model, converting GitHub issues into vector embeddings stored in the Milvus vector database to facilitate rapid similarity searches • Built an intuitive web interface using Streamlit, enabling users to explore similar issues, view analytics on API usage, and manage repositories seamlessly, enhancing overall user experience and productivity • Deployed the application using a robust pipeline with Airflow orchestration on a cloud-hosted GCP instance, ensuring reliable availability and scalability

job_role_matches.reasoning: The candidate's extensive experience in data engineering roles at Aretove Technologies and Accenture demonstrates a strong foundation in this field. They have worked with various databases (MS SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Snowflake, AWS Redshift) and tools (Python, PySpark, Spark, Scala, Java, Shell Script, AWS Glue, Databricks, Microsoft Azure, Airflow). Their projects also showcase their ability to design and implement comprehensive data models and automate workflows.

The candidate's experience at Schell Brothers showcases their ability to engineer AI-driven solutions and automate MLOps pipelines. They have worked with Redshift data, Random Forest models, Generative AI, vector-store technology, and Airflow. Their project 'AlssueFlow' further demonstrates their proficiency in NLP, embedding generation, and building intuitive web interfaces.

The candidate's experience in building and maintaining a historical data warehouse at Aretove Technologies indicates their expertise in this role. They have worked with Snowflake, Airbyte, Python, and DBT for data extraction, integration, and modeling. Their work on Slowly Changing Dimension (SCD) Type 2 models also showcases their ability to handle complex data warehousing tasks.

resume_summary.overall_summary: Rishabh Dinesh Singh is a highly skilled and versatile Data Engineer with extensive experience in various database technologies such as MS SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, AWS Redshift, and Snowflake. He has proficiency in programming languages like Python, SQL, PySpark, R, Spark, Scala, Java, and Shell Script, and is well-versed in cloud technologies such as Microsoft Azure, AWS (Redshift and Glue), Databricks, and Data Build Tool Cloud. His professional experience includes working at Aretove Technologies, Schell Brothers, and Accenture where he has demonstrated his ability to optimize data processes, automate workflows, and develop data-driven solutions.
key_strengths: Database Management: MS SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, AWS Redshift
Programming Languages: Python, SQL, PySpark, R, Spark, Scala, Java, Shell Script
Cloud Technologies: Snowflake, Microsoft Azure, AWS (Redshift and Glue), Databricks, Data Build Tool Cloud
